title: Event Custom Data
description: Event-specific data for attribution and reporting

value.description: Monetary value of the event (should be accompanied by currency)

content_ids.description: Item identifiers for catalog attribution. Values are matched against catalog items using the identifier type declared by the catalog's content_id_type field (e.g., SKUs, GTINs, or vertical-specific IDs like job_id).

content_type.description: Category of content associated with the event (e.g., 'product', 'job', 'hotel'). Corresponds to the catalog type when used for catalog attribution.

content_name.description: Name of the product or content

content_category.description: Category of the product or content

num_items.description: Number of items in the event

price.description: Price per unit of this item
